modName: Save game sided with Hadvaar all vanilla got greybeards 4 shouts
summary:
Yeah a ton of these I know. Take it for what it is, some might find use for it :)
ALL DLC required.
descriptionHtml:
Sided with Hadvaar, took the horn from Delphine and got the full unrelenting force shout. Don\'t think I agreed to talk to her about the dragons..I forget. Anyway Should be level 2 or so when you load  it.

 Place in Documents/My Games/Skyrim/Saves  you know the drill

 Everything was vanilla using generic nord male (preset one). No USKP used (although I added it later I\'d strongly recommend). Defeated cultists etc.

Yeah nothing special just a save game, gets rid of the repetitive stuff. Claw needs to go back to the Riverwood trader, left it that way so you can level up more to get more gold. 

Requirement: All DLC!
author: Sartori75
